PATIENT: [REDACTED].
CLINICAL SUMMARY: Evaluation of mediastinal lymphadenopathy in the setting of a LUL mass. A systematic EBUS survey was conducted. Lymph node stations 4R, 4L, 7, 10L, and 11L were visualized and sampled.
